description: Compared with rubber pipette bulbs and other manual aspiration devices, macro™ Blue Pipette Controller, BRAND is a reliable and ergonomic with a precise valve system and one-hand meniscus control. This product can be used for research, diagnotic, and clinical applications. The unique valve system provides precise single finger meniscus control, reducing the repeated movement tension of continuous liquid pipetting operation, and the operation is simple, even for novice users.
name: The macro Blue Pipette Controller
